title: 82/929/EEC: Commission Decision of 20 December 1982 establishing that the apparatus described as 'Tektronix - Waveform Viewing Transient Digitizer System, model WP 2010' may be imported free of Common Customs Tariff duties
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 20 December 1982
establishing that the apparatus described as 'Tektronix - Waveform Viewing Transient Digitizer System, model WP 2010' may be imported free of Common Customs Tariff duties
(82/929/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body: The apparatus described as 'Tektronix - Waveform Viewing Transient Digitizer System, model WP 2010', which is the subject of an application by the Federal Republic of Germany of 3 May 1982, may be imported free of Common Customs Tariff duties.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 20 December 1982.
For the Commission
Poul DALSAGER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 184, 15. 7. 1975, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 74, 18. 3. 1982, p. 4.
(3) OJ No L 318, 13. 12. 1979, p. 32.
